data.title: Nuncius
data.description: API client for HTTP request testing. Supports essential methods, JSON editor with syntax highlighting and bidirectional parameter synchronization.
data.objetive: Create a minimalist API client that prioritizes direct user experience, eliminating unnecessary barriers like login, while I delve into the internal architecture of this type of tools.

data.title: InfoBeer
data.description: Full stack beer catalog application. Explore beers organized by categories with their detailed characteristics.
data.objetive: Implement a dockerized full stack solution that covers the entire development cycle (frontend, backend, database), creating a complete beer catalog while I deepen my knowledge of container usage.
